staffsyncro.title: Software BPO/SaaS StaffSyncro
staffsyncro.description: A platform designed to efficiently manage and assign personnel, optimizing shift coverage and operational needs through advanced mathematical models. It helps businesses reduce staffing costs while maintaining service levels.

staffattendance.title: StaffAttendance
staffattendance.description: A comprehensive SaaS platform for attendance control, certified by the Chilean Labor Directorate (DT). It allows for precise management of employee attendance, schedules, and compliance with labor regulations.

supplysyncro.title: SupplySyncro
supplysyncro.description: A specialized software for supply chain management that uses sales forecasts to plan and automate the procurement and replenishment of thousands of SKUs, ensuring optimal stock levels.

video_analysis.title: Video Analysis
video_analysis.description: A SaaS software designed to retrieve critical information from security cameras and display it clearly for reporting, analysis, and decision-making.

bio: As *Head of Operations*, I have participated in all stages of *SaaS and BPO software development*, from conceptual design to usability.
Achieved measurable results including up to a *16% staff reduction* without operational impact and up to a *60% improvement* in personnel assignment.
*Product Manager* for multi-platform services for clients like Forus, La Polar, and Abcdin.
*Leader of the fulfillment* team, with a focus on continuous training and process standardization.
Sole developer of the *mathematical and AI models* for assignment and forecasting.

platforms.name: StaffSyncro Platform (personnel assignment)
description: Sole developer of mathematical models for assignment.
Software currently active, assigning more than 8,000 people.
Responsible for studies on staff reduction without compromising operations, achieving up to a 16% reduction.
Improvement in personnel assignment of up to 60%.
Product Manager for clients such as Forus, Abcdin, and La Polar.
Leader of the fulfillment team, standardizing requirements and measuring customer response time.

platforms.name: StaffAttendance Platform (Attendance Control)
description: Part of the team for the comprehensive design of attendance control software.
Company representative for over 25 clients, managing 4,000 people on SaaS.
Design and partial development of additional reporting for the Labor Directorate.

platforms.name: SupplySyncro Platform (Supply Chain Management)
description: Manager of the development of software for planning the procurement of over 10,000 SKUs.
Sole developer of mathematical models using AI combined with conventional models for sales forecasting.
Coordinator of the application design and development, supported by client feedback.

education.degree: Data Science, Big Data & Neural Networks - Python

projects.name: Video Analysis
projects.description: Software that extracts information from security cameras for reporting.
